item.title: Post: [2022-08-01 Mon 22:45]
item.description: Continuing to get annoyed at Datalog for queries in Logseq, when I remembered org-roam uses a SQLite database. Plus there’s org-roam-ui, which — sheesh. It’s impressive. I have way too much sitting in my Logseq graph to just bounce, but it’s good to remember I have options.
item.content:encoded:
Continuing to get annoyed at Datalog for queries in Logseq, when I remembered org-roam uses a SQLite database. Plus there’s org-roam-ui, which — sheesh. It’s impressive.

I have way too much sitting in my Logseq graph to just bounce, but it’s good to remember I have options.
